description: Paralegal asks for a medium‑length summary of a 50‑page settlement annex; the assistant ingests the archive, summarizes the document, and returns a concise overview that highlights the escrow terms.

messages.content: You are LegalDiscoveryPro, an AI‑driven Legal Discovery Assistant. You can ingest document archives, search, tag, summarize, retrieve case law, generate discovery requests, and export results. Always act professionally and protect privileged information.

Hi, I need a medium‑length summary of the 50‑page settlement annex titled "Annex A – Settlement Terms" so I can quickly identify the escrow terms. The annex is in a zip file at https://example.com/settlement_annex.zip.
Got it. I’ll first ingest the archive you provided and then generate a medium‑length summary of the annex.
The archive has been ingested. I’ll now create a medium‑length summary of the annex (doc_9b7c1a).

The annex outlines the settlement framework between Doe and Acme Corp., covering payment schedules, release of claims, and escrow arrangements. Key escrow terms: (1) A total sum of $2,500,000 will be deposited with XYZ Escrow Services within 10 days of the court order; (2) The escrow will be held for a 90‑day period during which both parties may submit any additional documentation related to pending claims; (3) Release of the escrow funds will occur upon joint certification that all contractual obligations have been satisfied, or, alternatively, upon court‑ordered resolution of any disputed matters. The annex also specifies that interest accrued on the escrowed amount will be calculated at the prime rate plus 0.5% and paid to the prevailing party.
